text: Tacok nyawong gop pih brat that salah Barangkasoe pih bek tapoh nyawong Ka Neupeuhareuem buet nyan le Allah Meulengkan meunyoe deungon sibeunar Meu tatueng bila hana peue salah Ureueng nyang poh gop ngon elanya Walijih teuma jeut jak tueng balah Kamoe bri hak nyan ubak si wali Tapi buet wali bek leupah-leupah Bek jitueng bila kon ban aturan Nyan tulong Tuhan ka Neubri mudah
